item.title: FaaSChain
item.description: FaaSChain - FaaS Functions as Chain faaschain allows to execute openfaas function as chain chain.Apply("image-compress"). ApplyAsync("upload", map[string]string{ "url": "http://s3.amazonaws.com/bucket", "token": os.GetEnv("aws_auth") }). ApplyModifier(func(data []byte) ([]byte, error) { data, _ := json.Marshal(map[string]string { "status" : "success", "url" : string(data) }) return []byte(data), nil}). Callback(os.Getenv("callback_url")) Getting Started Get faas-chain template faas-cli template pull https://github.com/s8sg/faaschain Create a new github function faas-cli new --lang faaschain mychain Edit handler.go vim mychain/handler.go

item.title: I'm Swarvanu Sengupta
item.description: A software engineer in Seoul, South Korea aboutMe := map[string][]string { "languages" : { "go", "java", "C", "C++", "python" }, "interests" : []string{ "Cloud, Distributed System", "Container and Co.", "Recently ML" } } Experience spreading across Application development, Computer Network, Building Cloud Based Solution, high-performance and high-availability distributed environments View my code on GitHub, connect with me on LinkedIn and check out my work below.
